mapper.insert: insert into bannercontrol (banner_id, banner_editor, banner_url, banner_status, banner_createtime, banner_updatetime, banner_createman, banner_updateman, banner_sor, banner_spare, banner_pic) values (#{bannerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bannerEditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bannerUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bannerStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bannerCreatetime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bannerUpdatetime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bannerCreateman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bannerUpdateman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bannerSor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bannerSpare,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bannerPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update bannercontrol set banner_editor = #{bannerEditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, banner_url = #{bannerUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, banner_status = #{bannerStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, banner_createtime = #{bannerCreatetime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, banner_updatetime = #{bannerUpdatetime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, banner_createman = #{bannerCreateman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, banner_updateman = #{bannerUpdateman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, banner_sor = #{bannerSor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, banner_spare = #{bannerSpare,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, banner_pic = #{bannerPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where banner_id = #{bannerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select banner_id, banner_editor, banner_url, banner_status, banner_createtime, banner_updatetime, banner_createman, banner_updateman, banner_sor, banner_spare, banner_pic from bannercontrol where banner_id = #{bannerId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by banner_sor

select banner_id, banner_editor, banner_url, banner_status, banner_createtime, banner_updatetime, banner_createman, banner_updateman, banner_sor, banner_spare, banner_pic from bannercontrol order by banner_updatetime desc

select banner_id, banner_editor, banner_url, banner_status, banner_createtime, banner_updatetime, banner_createman, banner_updateman, banner_sor, banner_spare, banner_pic from bannercontrol where 1=1
order by banner_sor
order by banner_updatetime desc

select banner_id, banner_editor, banner_url, banner_status, banner_createtime, banner_updatetime, banner_createman, banner_updateman, banner_sor, banner_spare, banner_pic from bannercontrol where banner_status=#{bannerStatus} order by banner_sor
